Module project.c195pa
Package DAO

Class CustDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.CustDAO
public class CustDAO extends Object
CustDAO class manages the Appointment methods used to interact with the database.

  • Method Details

    • getEveryCust

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getEveryCust()
      An Observable list is populated with all the customers from the database by performing a SQL query.
      Returns:
      allCustomers all appointments.

    • addCust

      public static boolean addCust(Customer newCust) throws SQLException
      Method that adds a new Customer to Customer in the database using a SQL insert statement.
      Parameters:
      newCust - user selects the save button in the add customer scene.
      Returns:
      addedRows if customer is able to be successfully added.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs when accessing the database.

    • getHighestCustId

      public static int getHighestCustId() throws SQLException
      Get the highest (maximum) customer ID from the database. When adding a new customer, the customer ID is generated by getting the highest customer ID and adding 1 to it.
      Returns:
      highesCustId the highest (maximum) customer ID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs when accessing the database.

    • modifyCust

      public static boolean modifyCust(Customer updateCust) throws SQLException
      Method that modifies/updates an existing customer's information by performing a SQL Update to the database.
      Parameters:
      updateCust - user selects the save button in the modify customer scene.
      Returns:
      modifiedRows if customer was able to be successfully modified.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs when accessing the database.

    • removeCust

      public static boolean removeCust(int customerId) throws SQLException
      Delete customer in the database by Customer ID. First, it is checked to see if the customer selected to be deleted has any existing appointments. If they do the user will receive an error message advising that the customer's appointments must be removed before the customer can be deleted. If customer does not have any appointments and is able to be successfully deleted, the user receives an information alert.
      Returns:
      removedRows if customer is successfully deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs when accessing the database.

    • getCustUsingCustID

      public static Customer getCustUsingCustID(int customerID) throws SQLException
      Get customer by customer ID from database using a SQL Select statement.
      Returns:
      new customer successfully found by customer ID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs when accessing the database.

    • getCustomersByCountry

      public List<CustomerByCountry> getCustomersByCountry() throws SQLException
      Used by the Customer by Country report, the number of customers for each country is found by performing SQL statements with the database.
      Returns:
      customersbycountry the number of customers by country.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs when accessing the database.
